description: This file contains platform-dependent utility functions for the Dslh Object Controller in the DSL Home Model, including a factory function to create new controller objects.
external_files: Relevant header assumed for the create function (not explicitly given)

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE DslhCreateObjController(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Factory function to create a new Dslh Object Controller instance, taking context handles as parameters and returning a handle to the created object.
